derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: acronym from situation normal: all fouled (or fucked) up

means.word_mean: 1. an acronym often used by soldiers in World War II: situation normal all fucked up
1. cause to be in a state of complete confusion
1. snarled or stalled in complete confusion;
